KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Directory isType 007
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: isString isObject isText isSymbol isStructure isDirectory isDictionary

Example.Description:
These examples check if the argument object is
of the type Directory.
If it is, the function returns true, otherwise, it returns false.

Syntax.Expression: <sc>(define Bob (new Directory: name: "Bob Smith" job: "Manager" salary: 2201.34)) </sc>
Syntax.Hints:
The syntax: (isType Directory: obj)
is also equivalent to: (isDirectory obj)
